author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-LSC Communications Enhances Book Production Capabilities With Purchase Of New Wide-Web Goss Press And High-Speed Binding Line
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Lsc Communications Inc:
* LSC COMMUNICATIONS ENHANCES BOOK PRODUCTION CAPABILITIES WITH THE PURCHASE OF NEW WIDE-WEB GOSS PRESS AND HIGH-SPEED BINDING LINE
* LSC COMMUNICATIONS - TO INVEST IN WILLARD, OH FACILITY WITH INSTALLATION OF A NEW GOSS WIDE-WEB PRESS AND A NEW HIGH-SPEED BINDING LINEâ€‹ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
